biotools.summary: Literature data mining tool that is based on the annotation of key terms in article abstracts followed by statistical co-citation analysis of annotated key terms in order to predict relationships between genes, compounds, diseases and phenotypes, and tissues and organs.

bioschemas.name: LitMiner
